description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à New Delhi, India. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport
hotels.title: New Delhi Airport Escape with Four Restaurants & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: It's all too easy to explore the wonders of New Delhi when you stay at Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape just a stone's throw from the airport. In between your explorations, take a break from the heat with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool or treat yourself to a manicure or spa treatment at Lea Spa & Salon. There are four dining venues onsite - feast on everything from burgers to pastries to mouthwatering, authentic Indian curries.

hotels.title: Sophisticated New Delhi City Break with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: In the heart of New Delhi’s exciting Okhla district, Crowne Plaza New Delhi Okhla, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect base to explore the storied city’s many charms, including Red Fort, Humayun’s Tomb and the Okhla Bird Sanctuary. After days spent appreciating New Delhi’s sublime history and great bazaars, savour dim sum and doppio ripieno ravioli at ChaoBella or classic patisserie at French Heart, or laze by the hotel’s mirage-like rooftop pool.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida
hotels.title: Sophisticated City Escape near New Delhi's Noida District with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Between New Delhi’s vivid historic districts and Noida’s storied temples sits Crowne Plaza New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida. This ideally located, sophisticated modern jewel offers the perfect gateway to one of the region’s most exciting business and culture districts, located just 20 minutes away, while offering access to top-notch facilities and services. Enjoy use of the mirage-like rooftop swimming pool and round-the-clock access to the business centre, drop into the onsite restaurant Infinity, which proudly serves sumptuous Italian plates daily, or embark on a voyage of relaxation at Hibiscus Spa. Leave it all behind to explore the region’s countless hidden gems, including Connaught Place or Noida Sector 18 for a shopping fix, or Akshardham Temple or Humayun's Tomb to step back in time.

hotels.title: Modern Five-Star New Delhi Stay with Palm-Fringed Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the best of India's capital at the five-star Crowne Plaza New Delhi Rohini, a purpose-built hotel for functions, weddings and events. Sleek facilities include a huge outdoor swimming pool, an fitness centre overlooking the manicured hotel grounds, and a myriad of ballrooms to suit any occasion. Fulfil any craving with Asian and international cuisine at the buffet-style Mosaic restaurant and find your favourite local dishes at the hotel's signature Spice Art Restaurant.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida
hotels.title: Delhi Centrally Located Modern Escape with Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant heart of Delhi when you stay at Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel. Major sites are within easy reach: visit the Red Fort, Humayun's Tomb and Mehrauli Archaeological Park all in a single afternoon. When you're not experiencing the whirlwind of this loud and proud city, stay in and enjoy a swim in your hotel's refreshing infinity pool, dive into authentic Indian cusine on the terrace at Cafe On 3, and work up a sweat at the modern fitness centre.
